Tucson gets the call from Leo.  He nods.

" I said things even I did not me=
an.  Of course I will go after him, but this is something I must do alone. =
" 

He transforms into his beast mode and looks to Talon and Straight Shot.=


" Talon, please see to it that Straight Shot is not alone, and see what y=
ou two can do about pulling together a recon team.  I have something import=
ant that needs my attention.  Wheelie has ventured off and he could be in g=
rave danger.  I will be back I promise."

Straight Shot salutes her brother=
.

" good luck Tucson."

He smiles, rubs his head against hers and Talon's =
and then quickly takes to the sky on outstretched wings.

Perpetually on th=
e move and constantly busy.

For a moment there was only stone cold silence from LEO as he watched<br>
e=
vents take place. WHEELIE leaving the room, the blow up on TUSCON's<br>

With an inordinate amount of care LEO reached dow=

comlink between himself and TUSCON. "Sir." he said =
with an extreme<br>
amount of calm in his voice. "I call you that because y=
ou are the<br>
commander of this field position." It was obvious that LEO w=
as making<br>
an attempt to remind TUSCON of what he was and his responsibi=
lities.<br>

LEO PRIME paused for a moment, taking the time to be sure =
his own calm<br>
was still in place. "A soldier under your command has gone=
 off in an<br>
attempt to recover Rodimus Prime on his own." Of course LEO =
was<br>
refering to WHEELIE.<br>

"You have told me that you revere Opt=
imus Prime." LEO straighted but<br>
still talked into the comlink, "Optimus=
 Prime was betrayed by one that<br>
he called a brother and yet he still ca=
rried on." (Animated Optimus<br>
Prime betrayed by Sentinal Prime) "And wha=
t of the original Optimus<br>
Prime? How many times times did he try to rea=
son with those who were<br>
his arch enemies?" (G1 Optimus Prime reasoning =
with the Megatron)<br>

ng him go to what is<br>
most certainly his doom or will you attempt to rei=
